'''''"The Bomber Will Not Always Get Through"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series X]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must destroy "Flamewind Feathers" launched by the [[Goldflame Qucusaur Tyrant]] twice during a single challenge.

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement is a reference to the phrase "{{w|The bomber will always get through}}," spoken by {{w|Stanley Baldwin}} about the relative inability of existing technology to resist the modern bomber. Decades later, following advancements in anti-ballistics, a study used the phrase "The bomber will ''not'' always get through" to recommend the use of missiles instead.
